answers.author: Mark Abeles-Allison
answers.text:
You should talk with the Bayfield Recreation Center in Bayfield County, WI.  This is a jointly operated project between the Bayfield School District and the Rec Center at non-profit.  The contact is Scott Armstrong, 715 779 5408.  They have done amazing things, reduced the cost to the school and raised funds in innovative ways.

author: Pamela Muse
text:
Mercer Island, WA is looking for examples of cities that have partnered with private non-profit membership organizations (e.g. YMCA’s, JCC’s) for the construction, financing and operation of swimming pools or aquatic centers. 
Rich Conrad
City Manager
City of Mercer Island, WA
(206) 275-7660
rich.conrad@mercergov.org
title: Partner w/Private Non-profit for Financing/Operation Pool/Aquatic Centers
